cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.NE 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the shortcomings of modern machine learning solutions in the contexts of computer vision and reinforcement learning, which are both subfields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also suggests directions to explore in order to ameliorate these weaknesses, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and robotics (cs.RO). Additionally, the paper mentions pattern recognition and intelligent reasoning, which are also relevant to neural networks (cs.NE). Finally, the title of the paper suggests a focus on cognitive programs, which could also fall under the category of computer vision (cs.CV).
